manifest.name: react-textarea-autosize
manifest.description: textarea component for React which grows with content

scripts.build:umd:prod: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c rollup.umd.config.js -i src/index.js -o dist/react-textarea-autosize.min.js
scripts.build:umd:dev: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -c rollup.umd.config.js -i src/index.js -o dist/react-textarea-autosize.js
scripts.docs:build: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -c example/rollup.config.js -i example/index.js -o example/bundle.js
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:build && cd example && rimraf .git && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update docs' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update docs' && git push git@github.com:andreypopp/react-textarea-autosize gh-pages --force
scripts.clean: rimraf es && rimraf lib && rimraf dist
scripts.release:patch: npm run prerelease && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm run prerelease && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm run prerelease && npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

manifest.readme: [![npm version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/react-textarea-autosize.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-textarea-autosize) [![npm](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/react-textarea-autosize.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/react-textarea-autosize) # react-textarea-autosize Drop-in replacement for the textarea component which automatically resizes textarea as content changes. A native React version of the popular [jQuery Autosize](http://www.jacklmoore.com/autosize/)!
